thread.title: RBS reaches $4.9 bln deal to settle U.S. investigation

title: RBS reaches $4.9 bln deal to settle U.S. investigation

organizations.name: view transcript royal bank of scotland

text:
RBS reaches $4.9 bln deal to settle U.S. investigation 1:02pm BST - 01:25
Royal Bank of Scotland has agreed to pay a smaller-than-expected $4.9 billion to resolve a U.S. investigation into its sale of mortgage-backed securities, paving the way for a long-awaited return of cash to UK taxpayers who bankrolled its post-crisis survival. David Pollard reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Royal Bank of Scotland has agreed to pay a smaller-than-expected $4.9 billion to resolve a U.S. investigation into its sale of mortgage-backed securities, paving the way for a long-awaited return of cash to UK taxpayers who bankrolled its post-crisis survival.
